wikipedia_page.main: Christian Howes (born 16 January 1973) is a public speaker and English television social media pundit, best known for working on the Big Brother spin-off show Bit on the Side, providing a weekly update with Emma Willis.

response: * Christian Howes (musician) (born 1972), American musician, educator, and composer
* Christian Howes (presenter) (born 1973), part-time TV presenter, public speaker
